caseTitle: Muhammad Rahim v. Mohsin Ali and another
tagline: The petitioner claims that an area of 919 square feet plot out of Bhadda land of Deh Pattar was transferred by Gul Muhammad in his name on the basis of registered sale deed and mutation was affected in the revenue record but plot number or survey number is not mentioned and the description in the sale deed also does not match with the plot in question. Also, he claims to have purchased the plot in question from Gul Muhammad but he was unable to satisfy the High Court as to how Gul Muhammad acquired title in the disputed plot.
